title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - June 8th, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - June 8th, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring highlights from the latest issue of Bloomberg Businessweek.

-Caroline Winter describes how to move an iceberg

-Shira Ovide explains how the next big phones could bring a billion people online

-Peter Coy details why no one is partying after the U.S. economy celebreates 10 years of growth

-Dimitra Kessenides shows how Huawei is digging in for a drawn-out battle with President Trump’s white house

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
